import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { addLoan } from '../actions/loanActions'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Button, Form, FormGroup, Input, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, InputGroup, } from 'reactstrap'; const LoanApplication = ({ addLoan }) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [loanAmount, setLoanAmount] = useState(''); const [loanTerm, setLoanTerm] = useState(''); const email = localStorage.getItem("email"); const role = localStorage.getItem("role"); const toggle = () => { setModal(!modal); }; const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newLoan = { name: name, loan_amount: loanAmount, loan_term: loanTerm, createdBy: email, role: role }; // Add loan via addLoan action addLoan(newLoan); // Open Modal toggle(); }; return (

); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ loan: state.loan, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { addLoan })(LoanApplication);
